page:
Has a fantastic work ethic and is very good at listening to leaders and leading his underranksmen.
Had two disputes with PowderTech1350, one at the rank of Captain and one about the promotion, after which PowderTech1350 resigned.
First to be promoted into the AC at the rank of Admiral, also first to be promoted to Admiral and first Executive Officer at the rank of Admiral.
Resigned from XO as of 20th September 2014.
